description: Commands to manage network function definition version resources.

commands.name: az aosm publisher network-function-definition version list
commands.summary: List information about the network function definition versions available in the specified network function definition group.
commands.syntax:
az aosm publisher network-function-definition version list --group-name
                                                           --publisher-name
                                                           --resource-group
                                                           [--max-items]
                                                           [--next-token]
examples: az aosm publisher network-function-definition version list --resource-group contoso-aosm --publisher-name contoso --group-name nginx

commands.name: az aosm publisher network-function-definition version show
commands.summary: Get information about a network function definition version.
commands.syntax:
az aosm publisher network-function-definition version show [--group-name]
                                                           [--ids]
                                                           [--publisher-name]
                                                           [--resource-group]
                                                           [--subscription]
                                                           [--version-name]

commands.name: az aosm publisher network-function-definition version update-state
commands.summary: Update network function definition version state.
commands.syntax:
az aosm publisher network-function-definition version update-state [--group-name]
                                                                   [--ids]
                                                                   [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                                   [--publisher-name]
                                                                   [--resource-group]
                                                                   [--subscription]
                                                                   [--version-name]
                                                                   [--version-state {Active, Deprecated, Preview, Unknown, Validating, ValidationFailed}]
examples: az aosm publisher network-function-definition version update-state --resource-group contoso-aosm --publisher-name contoso --group-name nginx --version-name 2.0.0 --version-state Active
